Text: Seeding will be slow for the next few hours. Then I will personally have three machines seeding this.

What version is this? European or American?
Yeah I'm dling this, after a looooong hiatus (I quit just after WoTG release), I'm just wondering if the POL.exe you included will work with XP?

Jason, the POL.exe included is for Vista. For XP you will install POL with FFXICollection2008 > PlayOnlinesetup.exe

Make sure you take a look at the instructions txt doc if you're confused.
